Name: 栄冠は君に レジェンドパック
About the game: ARTDINK 'Legend Pack' Series The ARTDINK 'Legend Pack' Series is a compilation of ARTDINK's masterpiece works of the 1980s and 1990s. The PC9800 versions of these games can finally be played in Windows. In addition, a Library Mode exclusive to the 'Legend Pack' allows you to browse illustrations, graphic and sound data. 'Eikan wa Kimi ni Legend Pack' is a compilation containing the following titles: 'Eikan wa Kimi ni' (original release 1990/07) 'Eikan wa Kimi ni 2' (original release 1991/06) 'Eikan wa Kimi ni 3' (original release 1993/07) The 'Eikan wa Kimi ni' series is a high school baseball simulation where you become a coach and guide your team to Koshien. This game is only available in Japanese.
